notes:
Introduced in [[Summer Update 2010]].
{{JSpoiler|Part of the [[Wrath of the Emperor Quest]].}}
name: Mutated Zalamon
location: East of [[Zao]] and south of [[Dragonblaze Peaks]], two floors below [[Zalamon]].
strategy: Trap him as fast as you can, knights will have to use challenge a lot since he tends to switch very often. [[Fire Bomb|Fire]] and [[Energy Bomb]]s will be helpful here.
